esef-24085_2021.value:
PJSC Magnit and its subsidiaries (the “Group”) operate in the retail and distribution of consumer goods under  the Magnit, the DIXY and the Megamart names. The Group’s retail operations are operated through convenience  
 stores, cosmetic stores, supermarkets and other.

esef-24083_2021.value: 15/5 Solnechnaya str., 350072, Krasnodar, the Russian Federation
